item.title: Notes on the 15th-week class (Cultivation Theory and Agenda Setting)
item.description: Cultivation Theory A quite objective theory in the socio-psycological tradition and socio-cultural tradition. Theorist: George Gerbner Key question: how media use affects the real world. How media makes people think about a very violent world. (especially heavy TV viewers) Also, Gerbner viewed TV as a story teller. 1. TV has changed in three ways since this theory was originally constructed. Abundance of choices One thing not change, is that many TV still emphasize on violence.
